EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Introducing Spring Session.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Introducing Spring Session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Introducing Spring Session with Josh Long. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 24, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e9c6a5bc68e28e48622f561f0f8c50bd8> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 662 934 402 Thank you,
